row.entry: Spot removal allows you to correct a zone in your image by using another zone as model.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: Click on the area to be healed then drag to a clean area. The circle with line inside is the clean reference area.
Use mouse scroll-wheel over the stroke to change its size.
Right-click on a stroke to delete it.
Close the module to complete the changes.

entry.para: Let's use this portrait as example; we want to remove some dirt and unwanted catchlight from camera popup strobe.

I have marked all the spots that I want to remove from the image. I first start by pressing the spot and drag to an area that should be used as reference to remove the spot. The handle (circle) which has a line that ends in the center of the circle indicates reference source.
